name: Neanderfall
description:
Neanderfall was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 based on the theme: "Out of Control".

Neal the Neanderthal is out of control, running for his life. The player has to use the objects provided to build a safe path to get him from start to finish.

Players can also create and share their own puzzles without leaving the game. There's an in-game level editor, and you can share/play others' levels via mod.io :O

---

Music, art and animation by Ethan Close. Development by Bilal Akil.

CAN'T BELIEVE WE MADE SUCH A MOD-ABLE GAME IN A GAME JAM LOLWAT
